scripts.json: node generate-extra-json.mjs && for id in channels-to-versions dashboard last-known-good-versions last-known-good-versions-with-downloads latest-versions-per-milestone latest-versions-per-milestone-with-downloads; do jsesc --object --json < "data/${id}.json" > "dist/${id}.json"; done
scripts.build: npm run find && npm run json && npm run render
